No filters, no noise, just music.

Finally, a social network that’s actually about something. No filters, no noise, just music and real moments.

I’ve discovered more new music in a month than ever before.

Since I started using NowListening, I’ve discovered more new music in a month than I used to in a whole year. It feels like having a personal music-curated feed.

Sharing music here feels so natural and fun.

NowListening makes sharing music feel natural. I hit play, post it, and suddenly I’m talking to someone who loves the same track. It’s simple, but addictive.

I keep meeting people who love the same music as me!

I love how easy it is to connect with people who share my exact music taste. I’ve already made a bunch of new friends just by posting what I’m listening to.

Every day I find a new song I can’t stop listening to.

Every time I open the app, I find a new artist or song I end up obsessed with. It’s become my go-to place for music discovery.

Finally, a community that speaks the same language: music.

As a music fan, this app is a dream. It’s like joining a community where everyone speaks the same language: music.

Thinking about advertising
yourself?

On NowListening, your promotion appears at the perfect moment: when users are living the music.

Are you an artist?

Promote your new releases right where people discover new music.

Are you a brand?

Reach users who care about headphones, speakers, instruments, apps, and everything that elevates the music experience.

Hosting a music event?

Showcase your festivals, concerts, or live sessions to users who are already ready to discover their next on-stage experience.
